name: Marvel Super Hero Squad: Comic Combat
name_original: Marvel Super Hero Squad: Comic Combat
description: Unleash the power of the pen in Marvel® Super Hero Squad: Comic Combat! The uDraw GameTablet® is the newest way to fight evil! Draw directly into the game to perform awesome attacks and turn the tide against Doctor Doom and his evil minions. Hero up with 10 playable Squaddies, including Thor, Captain America, and for the first time, Squirrel Girl! The battle lines are drawn in Marvel® Super Hero Squad: Comic Combat for uDraw™. Draw, Fight, Win!
